title: EPISTOLA T.L. Sherred
html:
EPISTOLA T.L. Sherred

Re Gary Muldoon's letter [XI,1], in 1861-65, a soldier who had seen the elephant had been in action.

[T.L. Sherred, Utica, Michigan]
